name: Talley Garrett
review: I had ordered mango pickle and it was really awesome. Highly recommended.

name: Lenore Buckley
review: The taste of the pickle is so good. But price of the product is so high.

name: Jewell Barton
review: Glass bottle, traditional recipe! What a combination! Thanks a lot.

name: Alta Holden
review: Authentic taste. Excellent pickles. But extremely spicy and expensive.

name: Nell Carr
review: North, South, East or West, Mango Pickle is the best. Loved it.

name: Olson Charles
review: Taste was really awesome, loved the packaging of the product.
